The Sunwai app is a helpful initiative by SBP for filing complaints against banks. However, it does not include Electronic Money Institutions (EMIs) like JazzCash, NayaPay, and SadaPay, which are widely used in Pakistan. Many users face issues with these services, such as unauthorized transactions and service failures, but there is no way to report them through this app. I request SBP to update Sunwai and add EMIs to the complaint system for better consumer protection.

Disappointed (one 🌟 ) that HBL Mobile lets you log in over any VPN – this undermines basic security protocols and opens the door to man-in-the-middle attacks. Please enforce stricter network checks and tighten your cyber defenses.
